content.detailedDescription: I found the image on google maps. i do not know when the satillate picture was taken. the object appears to be flying over the house in the image and does not belong there. the reflection is very bright, so you cannot make out the entire shape of the object, but you can see it has a form and you can see a trail from the east.
content.summary: Google maps image

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down a back dirt road in the upper peninsula of michigan with girlfriend at the time near a e.L.F facility and happened to look over i was in the passenger seat and i noticed a white light and said look what is that she stopped and i realized i was looking at a flying saucer it was disc shaped with a while half globe at the bottom no sound at all i stared at it for around five minutes and was getting ready to get out of the car and she got scared and took off i insisted on going back but she was too frightened. i have also had bigfoot experience up there also 2 yes ago.
content.summary: Seen saucer shaped craft

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting out back on my porch at about 2am, central standard time. we had just gotten back from a movie, and were outside enjoying the evening. i turned my gaze over the fence in my backyard and saw a gigantic boomerang shaped craft with yellow/orange/white running lights on the bottom. it flew within maybe a half a mile of me, maybe 2,000-3,000ft above. it was absolutely silent, and i mean silent. the night was completely dead, and even though this gigantic craft flew basically right over me, i didn't hear one sound. my girlfriend was with me at the time, and without turning away from it i asked her if she saw what i was seeing. she just responded by asking me what the hell it was.

 it had dim running lights on the bottom, it almost seemed as if it were shimmering or covered by a mist. it was almost indistinguishable from the night sky, if it were not for the running lights i would never have known it was right above me. it flew rather slowly over my house from east to west before disappearing beyond my sightline. it gave me a sense of awe because i am a big fan of aviation and i could not readily identify this craft based on my knowledge of current aerospace technologies. truly was my first ufo sighting in this world. i tried looking for resources regarding boomerang shaped usaf craft or projects, but when i came up empty i decided to contact mufon.
content.summary: Very large boomerang shaped craft flew completely silent over my house

content.detailedDescription: I got up around 7am, went into the bathroom and sat down to do my business. i happened to look out the bathroom window at a approx. 45 degree angle, and saw an object going slow, in daylight, about  10 mph, traveling straight east, just above the tree line.  the tree had no leafs on it cause it was still cold outside. by the time i could get up and open the window and look out, it was gone. the object looked like an upside down pie pan. it was a solid shape and dull silver in color. i could'nt  believe what i had just seen, but i know i saw it. everybody i told did not believe me. i have'nt mentioned it till now.
content.summary: I saw this object for only a few seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok i know i already reported one already, and it could've been nothing, but i felt i had to report this one again.  this time it happened in my hometown and it looked like the same lights that we saw when travelling home from thunder bay, but this time it was lower, and moved slower, and it travelled above me going north.  i didn't notice it right away when it was over me.  there was this guy yelling down the street about 400 yards from me "to look up there was something above" but i didn't pay attention to him i just thought he was randomly yelling around.  until i got closer to him and he said "look up look at that light, how can u not see it was right above u" by this time the object was about maybe 100 yards from me travelling north.  i tried to record it, and i got a little bit. and my cell was messing up it wouldn't focus on it, and once i thought i got it fixed, i tried to get a better and closer video but when i made it inside to view it the other two videos were blue/ black static, but the sound was on.  this orange reddish light looked like a glowing ball of gas or something travelling in like a zig zag motion like it was bobbing, but the other object i seen two weeks ago was travelling in speeds that were unreal, now this object was the same but it was lower and slower, there wasn't any noise.  i watched this thing fly away for about 10 minutes our community is only 1 square mile, and it took like 5 minutes till i couldn't see it anymore cause of trees... we are a remote community and there are no planes or helicopters are any objects that can create this.  even for the object i saw 2 weeks ago the highway we were travelling is deserted. and i don't think any drones would wanted to fly over at a low altitude for any reason.  ok so i wasnt going to report this incident, if it wasn't for the feeling that i felt afterwards.  my head was buzzing and when i would touch it a buzzy feeling radiated throughout like my hair.  and i woke up this morning with a huge migraine and i'm not one to get bad headaches, and it's been pulsating all day and still, i tried to take tylenol with codeine but it hasn't helped.  ok i just want to metion something, i am not one to pay attention to ufo's and what not and i would rationalize everything.  but seeing the same craft in a two week span and seeing it the second time where i live and it flying low, above me, and at a slow speed, and then feelings my head tingle like that afterwards, and now the huge migraine i have really freaks me out.  i didn't want to report this again a buty friend encouraged me to even post the video... ok u can hardly see the light but i will explain where it is then after you'll be able to locate it in the video.  thank u for overlooking my report, it may seem like nothing to a lot of people, but i'm starting to believe this stuff.  and just thought i should share.

you will be able to locate it once the lights from the house appear, and look up to the left you should be able to see it, like i said my camera couldn't catch it although i was practically right under it.
content.summary: This look like the same i reported 2 days ago reddish orange but hovering slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
I shot this video on 31 march at night around 12:30 am at pavillion end club, gulshan-e-iqbal, block 10, karachi, pakistan when we were hanging out.
we suddenly saw something glowing in the sky near moon.
we first thought may be its some kind of firework or something someone has shot but it wasn't.
it was like glowing/burning fireball type object hovering then start moving slowly in the sky without any sound leaving a trail type thing of smoke maybe. there was no sound at all. the thing was clearly under some kind of intelligence control because it was not moving in a straight path.
i can assure you it wasn't any plane, rocket or any meteorite or asteroid, as we have seen them before. this was totally different.
we all saw it and was speechless.. i suddenly got an idea to shoot it from my phone. i then record that thing on phone.
after some time it just slowly disappear.

i am sending you the video as it is. you can check it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A hovering glowing ball of yellow light.

content.detailedDescription: I was working as a custodian at an elementary school in ypsilanti mi after my shift was ending approximately 11pm and was leaving to go home  i escorted a teacher to her car which was a common practice with her she was always staying late working she was a special education teacher of approximately 25 years of service i was talking to her on our way to her car as we were talking before she entered her vehicle  i witnessed an object light up and take off (blink out) approximately 100ft from us tree top high when i noticed it starting to (light) up i told her to look she turned around and it blinked out as fast as she could turn then all of a sudden another one appeared next to it and was either invisible or? just appeared, lighting up and taking off in another direction (east) i immediately asked her wow! what do you think that was? and she said something to the effect it's not 'fireworks'. and asked me what i thought it was i automatically thought it was a disk shaped ufo, i have pretty much all my life believed in extraterrestrial life and have had other sightings throughout my life, we're not alone she said to me 'anyone would have to be naive to think we're alone in this universe' she then entered her vehicle and left, i went to my car and drove home, nervous and anxious to tell my family what i saw.
content.summary: I escorted a teacher to her car and was talking to her when i witnessed an object light up and take off when i noticed i told her to look she turned around and it blinked out, then all of a sudden another one appeared and took off in another direction

content.detailedDescription:
I first reported this event on dec. 16 2014. i thought i received a confirmation that you received it but wanted to report some additional info and i can not find an email confirming that you received my report so i will start over.

sometime in feb. of 2014 i was camped in my rv in owl canyon just north of barstow. i was sitting at the front windshield watching the stars when the first light came into view over the ridge to the sw. the rv was facing south so the lights were moving directly in front of me toward the ne. the lights continued to appear one after the other until all of them were in view. to my left was another ridge. when the first light reached a point about half way between the ridges i began to hear a faint but clear whirring sound. the first thing to come to mind was the sound i have heard from a blimp. within a few seconds and as the string of lights grew longer i thought it might be an ultralight craft pulling the lights with a tether. i discarded that because there was absolutely no wavering to the lights as they remained in a straight line and maintained position related to each other. the dots blow show the position of the lights.

                             .   
    ne           .   .   .     .   .           sw
                           .

they were moving right to left and maintaining the relationship to each other as shown above. the lights were all red and the last light to the right also had a blinking red light. i could not see a structure, only lights. since first reporting this i have done some research on owl canyon and it is about 2000 ft between the 2 ridges. the formation covered the whole distance so this would mean the lights were about 400 ft apart from one another. i watched this for about 5 minutes so the speed must have been around 5 mph. i estimate the altitude at 300 ft. the lights appeared to be perfect squares somewhere around 12 ft x 12 ft. as the last light reached the ridge on the left then they all turned bright white except the last one which remained red. after a few seconds they all simply disappeared. at first i could not believe what i was seeing but over time the more i think about this i am convinced the lights were attached to each other in a rigid structure. i know what i saw, i just don't know what it was. one other thing, after looking at a map, i see that edwards afb is directly to the sw of my position at the time.
content.summary: Low altitude red lights

content.detailedDescription: It was the summer of 1969. i was 14 years old and me and a friend had just returned to my parent's house with my aunt, who also resided at this residence. my aunt parked in the driveway near the backyard and the first thing to catch our eye, among the circular grove of trees, was thousands of lightning bugs. looking around, we noted that there were no lightning bugs anywhere else, only in our backyard. it looked like a light show of twinkling christmas lights. but i did find it strange that the lightning bugs were only congregating in our backyard and nowhere else. my friend and i hadn't caught lightning bugs in a couple of years. afterall, we were 14. but seeing this light spectacle, made us run in the house, grab a couple of jars, poke holes in the top, and run to the backyard. my aunt stayed in the house to watch television with my mother and father. my friend and i began crawling around the backyard, scooping lightning bugs into our jars. in less than 5 minutes, i must have had a hundred lightning bugs in my jar. i stood up, and held my jar up in the air to look at it because it was glowing like a bright greenish lantern. however, when i looked up, i saw a dark, disc shaped object, with flashing lights spinning around it. it was approximately 100 ft. above my head at the time but, appeared to be slowly and silently descending. the glow of lights on the disc, did not cast light or shadows on the ground, even though they were brightly lit. the color and glow of the lights on the disc, very much resembled the glow of the lightning bugs. and, the thousands of lightning bugs that had been there moments before, were now gone. when i saw the disc silently descending, my first thought was "oh my god! it's a flying saucer". i was 14 and not frightened at all. but, when i told my friend to look up, she had the opposite reaction. she began to scream. she flapped her arms, and threw herself on the ground, crying. i began loudly yelling for my mother and father; i wanted them to see this. strangely, it was a hot summer night, our neighbors were close by, all their windows were open, and yet no one responded to the loud commotion we were making. only my mother emerged from our house. the first words out of her mouth were, "oh my god"! she began calling for my father and aunt to come out but they never did. the three of us stood and watched the silent, glowing disc descend from about 100 ft, to no more than 8ft above our heads. my mother realized that my friend and i were still directly below the disc. she told me later that she feared that the disc might have been there to abduct us. my mother began shouting to us from the driveway. she said, "i think it's trying to land. it can't land with you two right under it so, back up so it can land". my friend and i backed up, and the disc descended a couple more feet like it was going to land but it didn't. it hovered silently for over 15 mins. my friend was still in a panic, face down on the ground, not looking. my mother and i were curious and intrigued. we tried to peer beyond the windows of the disc to see inside but all we could see were a couple of dark figures. the figures were either wearing helmets or had huge heads but we could only see them in shadow-like form. at this point we, including the disc, were all silent, anticipating what would happen next....Hoping something remarkable would happen. but, after hovering for about 15 mins., the disc began to ascend, slowly and silently. when it reached approximately 100 ft in the air, it suddenly shot straight up into the sky, until it was just a tiny ball of light no bigger than a star. we then watched it leave the sky, in what i call start/stop movements because it would fly/stop, fly/stop. it changed direction several times after a stop but, it always flew straight, never in a curve or arc....Just straight. it was gone from the sky in less than 3 seconds. i am not sure how fast it was travelling to leave our sight in less than 3 seconds. i did know, even then, that i had never seen anything travel that fast in our world. my mother's comment then was, "they came from far beyond this world". after we lost sight of the disc, we ran in the house to see why my father and my aunt had refused to come outside. they sat staring at the television, and the only answer they gave was, "i don't know", in unison. my friend, on the other hand, who was obviously traumatized began saying that she saw nothing. she never again, to this day, admitted witnessing the most fantastic thing that my mother and i had ever seen. we never reported what we saw but, the day after we saw the flying disc, we saw a small article in our local paper that stated that someone reported seeing an object fly overhead, extremely fast.They also noted the start/stop movements, and the fact that it would  change direction.  my mother is 97 years old now and still sharp as a tack but, sadly, we never got to tell our story to anyone who cared. my mother and i have talked about what we witnessed at least once a week for the past  46 yrs. it has never left our mind for even a moment. i just wish we could tell our story while i still have my mother to back up the details. i hate to see a remarkable but true story, lost to history.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo appeared to be attempting to land within a circular grove of trees in my parent's backyard. it descended and hovered no more than 8ft from the ground.
Saw what looked like a full moon orange in color, rolling toward me lost over 2hours in time had a large hand print on my left shouldet

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a photo of the sunset over venice and looking through my photos afterwards i noticed a bright circle to the left of the sun, inside thus circle was four really bright dots.
content.summary: I was taking a photo of the sunset over venice and looking at the photo afterwards i noticed a ufo to the left of the sun

content.detailedDescription: Taking photos of sunset.  ufo spotted in photos after photos examined.  have no idea what object was.  it moved erratically, changing direction often. surprised to spot object in photos of sunset.  object shot up an disappeared up into the clouds.
content.summary: Ufo spotted in picture of sunsut.

content.detailedDescription: In 1989 we lived in a two story home with all bedrooms upstairs.We had just put our kids to bed. then we settled in our bed. i saw a blue teardrop light on the wall of our bedroom, between the fireplace mantle & the bath door. i asked my wife what the heck and she saw it also. now we lived on almost 2 acres with a partially paved/gravel street. at that time there were no houses to to south or east ofour house so i got up to look for the direction of the light . there no vechicles anywhere no noise  infact silence. i turned to face my wife she was sound asleep.I walked to light and it wsa pulsating,i ran my finger across it, this is stupid but felt alive.Then i saw multi-colored lights from the top of the stairs.Then i woke it was daylight.  for the nexttwo years the triangle object appeared above thetree line and smaller objects came from it and they circled the house. in all i the big object and 3 small ones.
content.summary: My wife & i justwent to bed when we saw a blue light

content.detailedDescription: It was a nice sunny florida day and i was sitting on my porch and looking at the sky, no clouds at all, and all of the sudden a small cloud appeared and then grew in size in a round formation vertical to the ground and from the center a hole opened and an object burst from the center in a flash of light and then the cloud and object vanished.  no sound, nothing came from the area.  it favored the pictures you see when an aircraft breaks the sound barrier but there was no sound what so ever.  i have watched the space shuttle as it re-entered the atmosphere and heard the boom associated with it and also heard the booms when the air force flies of the eastern coast but there was nothing with this event.  just a bright flash and then silence.  i really didn't know what to think at first but the more i reflected on what i saw the more out of ordinary it seemed.  i could not figure out how a cloud could just appear in an other wise beautiful blue sky especially vertical to the ground.  there is a lot of different opinions on ufo's and i respect most of them but i also believe we are not alone and history has shown over and over we have been influenced by other than human intervention.
content.summary: Circular cloud formed object appeared from it reflected and both vanished

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting may not be to interesting as it was long ago but when something like this is seen with a persons own eyes it is never forgotten. 
i was driving home from lasalva beach when i saw it descending. there was a full moon that night and there was also quite a bit of light from the near by cities as well in that area. this area there is only about 1/4 mile between old hiway 1 and the freeway between santa cruz and watsonville. i pulled off the road to look at it as i could instantly see it was not a helicopter or airplane i knew of. i got out of my car and it landed about 100 yards away. i ran through the high grass to get a closer look and managed to get a little less than 100 feet from it. 
it had what looked like windows i could see  what looked like what we would call the grays now days. the inside of the craft was brightly lite so i couldn't see any details. mostly just there outlines. shortly after that it lifted off and flew tword santa cruz very slowly. what ever or who even did not leave the craft while it was landed. i was living with a buddy at the time and i told him when i got home. he was interested it it too and so the next morning we went back out there and sure enough we found 6 square imprints about 12 x 10 inches where the ground was smashed down about 2 inches deep. that's all i can say because at that time i knew no one that would want to investigate it further. there  is a movie that came out about twelve years later that had a scene at the end. i could not believe how close that ufo was to what i had seen that night. the move was called strange invaders. naturally it had nothing to do with what i had seen because in the 60's there was nothing like that.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo in field between old hiway 1 and new freeway near aptos calif.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside and saw a craft moving very slowly about 1-2 miles away and it was shining a huge beam of light that appeared to shine another 1-2 miles ahead of it. it traveled north for ten minutes or so,then made a 90 degree turn west,right towards me. the diameter of the beam looked like it was 12 feet tall at that point,taking into account it was still 1-2 miles away. ten to fifteen minutes later it slowly moved across the five acre lot beside ours,approximately 500 ft.Above the ground and from me. it had red,green and white lights,and i believe it was the white lights that were flashing. i could see a dark colored body to the craft but couldn't make out a shape because it was so dark outside. it did not appear to have wings. it was very still and quiet out being in a rural area and the only sound it made was like a whisp of air movement or the sound of a breeze. it was moving approximately 30 mph.
content.summary: Saw a craft with the brightest beam of light moving about 30mph and could hear only a whisp of air.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home, and as i was driving, a large green circular object flew across the sky. it was gone in a second. it flew over me directly over me coming from the west, and went in a straight line east. immediately after, i searched "green light" on twitter, and a handful of other people said they saw the same exact thing. these witnesses were from pa, new jersey, and massachusetts.
content.summary: Large green light flew across sky. gone in a second.

content.detailedDescription:
On 01 april 2015 at about 10:30 pm, i was looking outside toward the ne direction. my property overlooks smithtown bay towards connecticut. the sky was clear and no clouds.  no back yard lights were on. the only lights from land were from the connecticut shoreline about 13 miles away. in addition, i had observed typical aviation lights in the distance closer to the connecticut shoreline.

then, within 200 feet of my position, a very bright sphere shaped object suddenly appeared over the smithtown bay at about a 500 foot altitude in the ne direction. the object quickly caught my attention because it seem to appear from nowhere and was glowing bright white/blue. i was surprised and amazed because i never saw anything like it and wondered what it was. the object made no sound. it hovered  briefly. then, the object changed direction and disappeared quickly moving upwards in an easterly direction and just vanished. 

i did not think this was an airplane or helicopter. first, i did not hear an engine sound. second, the aviation lights were incorrect. the object's lights were the wrong color and not flashing like typical aviation lights. lastly, the object and light disappeared too quickly unlike slower more direct moving aircraft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing blueish/white sphere

content.detailedDescription: My wife, daughter, son & i were on our way home from dairy queen when i spotted two bright orange balls of light in the sky. they did not have strobes or other lighting. i have been a pilot for 12-years and these objects were not airplanes. we drove out in the desert toward them and took pictures & video. they hovered approximately 500-1,000 feet in the air. they would disappear and then reappear in different spots. i saw as many as three orbs flying together. they disappeared and they reappeared many miles away and then sped off together at a very high rate of speed... i'm talking about a blink of an eye. that's how fast.
content.summary: Witnessed orange orbs. would disappear then reappear with more orbs. in blink they flew away.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen these objects many times. at first you think they are stars, but then they start moving. they move around a lot, when it is later in the night. i often count 15 or more.  i have seen them many nights. please don't release my name.  just look at the stars late at night. you will see them. these star like objects will start moving. they do so later in the night. you dont have to believe me, just watch, you will see them. i have seen them many nights now.
content.summary: I have seen these star like objects, shine very brightly in sky. they twinkle and have rays. last night i counted 15. they look like very bright stars then they start to move around. they seem to be more active late at night. you would think they were

content.detailedDescription: Coming home and saw this enity in front of the house and i was getting closer to it .Then it turned around and dissapreared and went to the location
content.summary: Was comin g home and enity was in front of the house and i was getting closer to it .Then it turned around and dissapeared

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I went over to my families house. it was about 930pm. as soon as i got out of my car i saw something strange in the sky.  it looked like a giant star in the sky.  my mom came outside and witnessed it as well.  we got binoculars  to look closely to see what it was.  once we saw it through binoculars we noticed it was spherical in shape hovering in the sky. it had a couple red lights at the top and around the center of the ufo were green and red lights pulsating.  it was hovering low at first. then after a while you could see that it would turn to its side. and get further away.  after about an hour of it hovering it started to move faster out of the atmosphere and we could not make it out.
content.summary: Without binoculars looks like a spherical orange object about silver dollar sized.  with binoculars you could see all of the lights  which were red and green

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at entrails from the planes that leave o'hare and i took one picture and then i saw the glowing object kind of trailing the plane and i took a quick picture..) i was driving my car. also it looks like a dove type of aura around the object too.
content.summary: I was taking photo's of planes from o'hare and this showed up.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 28th shortly after 9 p.M. i was upstairs and i looked out my bedroom window facing west.  in the sky above the progress ridge shopping center i saw two red lights above the new seasons area flying relatively low.  they were not moving but were hovering over the area.  i knew immediately that it was not a normal sight and i ran downstairs to get outside quickly for a better view of the objects.  

my family was downstairs and ran outside after me onto our deck asking what i was doing and i showed them the lights! we were completely amazed and watched them for over three minutes before they disappeared. none of us could believe what we were seeing in our own backyard so to speak! my son was quick on his feet and recorded the sighting on his iphone 6.   

once we were outside and could see better we also noticed that they had a triangle shape to them.  the red lights were very bright and the light at the tip of the triangle was the brightest.  but they had lights on the sides as well. they appeared to dim and then get brighter and then repeat that process.  they hovered over the area and then slowly moved towards the north.  one of the lights seemed to just go out but then reappeared behind the first one and moved quickly back to the front. it dropped hundreds of feet and back in front again in a second!  

they stayed a constant red color. the only thing that changed was the intensity of the red.  eventually the first one moved into a fog bank and disappeared or just went out. the second one did the same thing.  we watched for another half hour or so waiting to see if they would reappear but they did not.  

i am not sure what we saw but it was something.  we did not hear any sounds coming from them but neighborhood dogs were barking like crazy and seemed agitated while they were around.  if it was a lantern then it could not move that fast and change direction. a laser would not be a triangle shape.  it is a mystery!! but glad that we were there to witness it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We witnessed two red, triangular shapes hovering and moving slowing across the sky on march 28th about 9 pm

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were longboarding around my neighborhood around 8pm.
we were going up and down the streets on our longboards, while we were approaching a stop sign we noticed 4 stars which were red. at first glance they looked like normal stars but they were red and in a perfect diagonal line(45 degree angle), the highest starlike object being to the left and the lowest being to the right. they were maybe around 50 feet apart from each other.(best guess) no more then a minute later the top one following the other two formed into the bottom one and began to descend into the tree line. the speed of the descent of the object was maybe two times slower then a shooting star. we then proceeded down the road to where there was open sky (no trees or houses) and the object was gone. i had never seen anything like it before. i was disappointed that we had lost sight of the object and had no time to record it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Four red starlike orbs were hovering in a diagonal line and merged into one and then descended.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work outside in my car. i looked through my windshield and seen 3 large discs that looked like they were in almost a zip zag pattern like they were observing the area.  they stopped and one bright light flashed from one (the center disc)  my radio in the car  cut  out my cellphone froze and the walkie talkie i keep in the car had static coming through. i kept watching and then the radio came back in less than 30 seconds later and then the discs went into separate directions one going east the other west and the third came forward it happened so fast but i could see the one disc from far away for at least 20 minutes
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 large discs surveying area then disappears

content.detailedDescription:
1) in my room, resting, looking out my window, had to get up and run to the window to see them as they went past quite fast
2) the 3 ufos were quite obvious against the blue sky (i would not have seen them if it was cloudy).
3) ufos.  those were not birds.  they had no wings (not planes, not birds)
4) they just passed by my house at a fairly well-elevated height.  the only remarkable thing was they all pulsated white light at the same time (in tandem).
5)shock and awe--i never see ufos here by my house like this!
6) i couldn't get outside fast enough to keep watching.  they moved so quick.  

*their shape is hard to describe, maybe not teardrop, but egg-shaped, but with gentle angles (soft diamond shape?).  the visual size was between starlike size and aspirin size.  actual size had to be huge as they seemed quite high.
*they remained in formation during any visual i had of them, maintained their path, and were quite fast.  
*there appeared to be thin blue lines (compared to the crafts) across them in the middle of the crafts.  they looked like a whiter metallic, and the pulsation (since it was daytime) was probably not as bright as it would've been at night.  

i heard airplanes afterwards, but they sounded like normal passenger flight patterns, not jets.
content.summary: Three ufos pulsing in tandem heading almost directly north

content.detailedDescription:
Since june of 2014 witness has seen multiple star like ufos in the sky starting at sunset
at first witness thought they were stars and watch them move across the western sky, some are white and some are reddish orange.
when witness shined a red laser light at them they move and evade the light, other wise they just sit in the sky like stars. one has shown up right at sunset and is very bright white, it is not jupiter.
witness still sees them every night at sunset and so has his wife and neighbor across the street.
witness is fifty miles from a major airport and major dam. no military bases nearby and no overflying aircraft..
witness was a former firefighter doing crash and rescue
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Since june of 2014 witness has seen multiple star like ufos at sunset, they moved when he shined a red laser light at them

content.detailedDescription: I didn't actually see this at the time. it was in my picture when i got it back. there were no clouds. i've looked at this for almost 40 years wondering what it was. i lived in the area of the joplin spooklight, which i did see. still get goose bumps thinking about it. if you can clean this up and let me know what you see. thanks
content.summary: In 1976 i was taking some pictures of the countryside before i moved to ca. when my pics came back i saw this in it.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night, march 31,2015. i was stopping over my parents house with my one year old daughter... it was around i think 10:20 pm. i stop there a lot because i have a sick father and i want him to see his granddaughter as much as possible. i drove down there street pulled in the driveway, went to get out of my car, just happen to look up and saw a huge!!!!!! glowing amber ball of light. it was beyond... i think it took my breath away! so parked in my parents driveway with my one year old still in the back seat, i ran to the front door and yelled for my brother to come out n look. so after he came out i ran my baby into n gave her to my mom... baby was crying from a dirty diaper. my brother then went in... i stayed out waiting for my phone battery to charge so i could get a quick video, because i wanted my fiancé to see it, i facetime him he sees it. i only got 3 mins of video. and it had to be there glowing n hovering for a good hour..If not 40 mins. so i had to go in because my baby has separation anxiety. held her, opened my parents back door it was still there.. by the time i told my dad.. he and my brother got in the car to go n look for it some more. but it was gone by the time they left. my mom was scared yelling at all 3 of us and said shut n lock my doors. and then i left my parents n went home and i was telling me fiancé all about it some more and i just rember feeling different. and when i was driving home and even when i got home i felt so many different emotions. excited, spiritual, paranoid. it was hard driving home because i couldn't help but to keep looking up! 

sorry i'm not so good at writing... but it hovered for a good 40 mins and it just glowed bright and then would dim at random... i just sat n stood i kept going back n forth from my car trying to check if my phone was charged yet.  it was about 3-4 houses down from my parents house and look to be about less than 100 ft above the house n tree... it was low. and lake erie is right there. and i guess that's it
content.summary: Last night i saw a beautiful amber glowing orb 3-4 houses down from my parents house, which is close to lake erie.
